thought: To craft a stone_pressure_plate, I need to place two stone blocks in the crafting grid. To get stone, I need to smelt cobblestone. Therefore, I will smelt the cobblestone in slot 42 to an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 42 to slot 12 with quantity 1
